document_title: Gastritis antrum: Causes, symptoms and prevention
subsection_content:
Where is the location of the gastric antrum?
The gastric antrum is located near the end of the stomach, between the body and pylorus. The stomach has 5 main parts including: cardia, gastric bulge, body, antrum and pylorus
The gastric antrum is considered an important part inside the stomach, a sensitive and vulnerable place. Therefore, cases of antral gastritis are tending to increase.
